channel.title: Android on pshegger's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Android on pshegger's blog

item.title: RenderScript is Still alive
item.description: RenderScript is a great way to compute large amount of data, so let's discover together what it is and when should it be considered.

item.title: gRPC for Kotliners
item.description: gRPC is a worthy alternative for REST, let's explore together what it is and how to use it as a Kotlin developer.
